intro.header: The easy &  {lb} affordable way of {lb} getting things {emphasis}
intro.paragraph: Juggle will help you get stuff done by posting any tasks you need accomplished and get connected to the right professionals, all while working around your budget and schedule.
nochance.title: Your to-do list stands no-chance
nochance.paragraph: Start crushing your to-do list by simply posting whatever you need to be done and our trusted Jugglers will be right there for you
category.title: Just post a task and we'll take care of the rest
category.paragraph: Posting a task on Juggle is easy and free of charge. Just explain what needs to be done, when and your budget for the job. Juggle can help you with:
jugglers.title: Receive offers & choose the right person for the job
jugglers.paragraph: Browse through a list of people interested in completing your task and choose the best suiting person for it based on reviews, skills, verification badges and more
footer.title: Sign up now for early {emphasis}
footer.paragraph: Only the good Stuff! We promise!
